original: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahi āyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
analyzed: upādā dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammāḥ pe

original: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekena āyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
analyzed: cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammāḥ pe

original: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā
citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānehi dhammehi ye dhammāḥ
citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhūhi dhammehi ye dhammāḥ

original: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā pe

original: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
analyzed: ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā pe

original: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekena āyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā

original: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva kilesa sampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā pe

original: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca iva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: kilesa sampayuttehi ca iva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā
kilesa vippayuttehi asaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā
dassanena pahātabba hetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā
bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā

original: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā
analyzed: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena a saṅgahitā āyatana saṅgahena a saṅgahitā

original: dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena
analyzed: dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena asaṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena

original: asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
analyzed: asaṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena asaṅgahitā te dhammāḥ katihi khandhehi katihā āyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā

original: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahi āyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā
